Articles.Content:
I am moving back with my grandfather on Saturday, this means, no more mod downloading, no more updates, no more uploading videos. No internet at his house so none of that. Can't even browse the forums and see awesome pics that so many of you guys post!

On a happier note, the devs, are about the most awesome game devs I think I have ever seen as they actually listen to the players, but also their fan base, is not like most. Most players here are respectful, not demanding, not getting mad over everything the devs add or don't add. Yes some people disagree with the devs but 9 out of 10 times, they don't hold grudges and still enjoy this amazing game.

Mod devs, same thing, amazing, they listen to their fans and again their fans are usually respectful.

So I guess I'm gonna be stuck on 0.24 for a long while. Hope I'll see you all soon, can't wait to see what this game will bring in the future!

(Now that I see what I wrote up, maybe GD isn't the best place for this thread, mods sorry, feel free to move it!)
Hope to see you come back soon!
It's always sad to see fellow KSP'ers have to say goodbye, even when it's temporary. May we meet again someday soon!
You could get a laptop and use your phones data connection to connect to the internet.

Moved to the Space Lounge (and sorry for your plight ).
Yes, but my plan on allocates 1 GB per month of mobile data (hot spot included) and don't even need a tether. My desktop has a built in WIFI capability.
